ConfigEntry.ConfigEntryObject: <Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>ComplianceRuleViolationsByDepartment</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, {1} compliance rule violations", SizeValue ,ColorValue , ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><Width>400</Width><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><Height>400</Height><DashboardDefMonthly>ComplianceRuleViolationsByDepartmentMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>ComplianceRuleViolationsByDepartmentYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, rule violations {3} by {1}", SizeValue ,abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"))</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Rule Violations")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Identities")</SizeValueTerm> </Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>ComplianceRuleViolationsByLocality</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, {1} compliance rule violations", SizeValue ,ColorValue , ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><Width>400</Width><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><Height>400</Height><DashboardDefMonthly>ComplianceRuleViolationsByLocalityMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>ComplianceRuleViolationsByLocalityYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, rule violations {3} by {1}", SizeValue ,abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"))</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Rule Violations")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Identities")</SizeValueTerm> </Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>ComplianceRuleViolationsByProfitCenter</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, {1} compliance rule violations", SizeValue ,ColorValue , ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><Width>400</Width><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><Height>400</Height><DashboardDefMonthly>ComplianceRuleViolationsByProfitCenterMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>ComplianceRuleViolationsByProfitCenterYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, rule violations {3} by {1}", SizeValue ,abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"))</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Rule Violations")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Identities")</SizeValueTerm> </Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>ComplianceRuleViolationsByRole</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, {1} compliance rule violations", SizeValue ,ColorValue , ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><Width>400</Width><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><Height>400</Height><DashboardDefMonthly>ComplianceRuleViolationsByRoleMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>ComplianceRuleViolationsByRoleYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, rule violations {3} by {1}", SizeValue ,abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"))</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Rule Violations")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Identities")</SizeValueTerm> </Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>ComplianceRuleViolationsByRule</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#Rule {1} has {0} violations", ColorValue,ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><FilterByObject>False</FilterByObject><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><EqualSized>true</EqualSized><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>ComplianceRuleViolationsByRuleMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>ComplianceRuleViolationsByRuleYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#Rule violations of {1} {2} by {0}", abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"),)</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Violations of this rule")</ColorValueTerm></Object>

ConfigParam.Description: translate("#LDS#List of rules charts and heatmaps on the governance start page")

Container.Condition: IsPreProp("COMPLIANCE") and ((IsNullOrEmpty(Part()) or Part()="Compliance") and exists("person", GetConfig("VI_Start_Governance_Compliance_Condition")))

ConfigEntry.Value:
sqland( sqlcompareuid("uid_person", variable("%useruid%")), format("uid_person in ({0})",
-- visible for Compliance & Security Officer format("select uid_person from personinaerole where {0}", SqlCompareuid("uid_aerole", "CAP-AEROLE-IAG-CISO"))
+" union all "+
-- visible for Auditor format("select uid_person from personinaerole where {0}", sqlcompareuid("uid_aerole", "CAP-AEROLE-AUDITING-AUDITOR"))
+" union all "+
-- visible for: Compliance Framework Verantwortliche ComplianceArea.UID_OrgResponsible "select piae.UID_Person from PersonInAERole piae join AERoleCollection aec on aec.UID_ParentAERole = piae.UID_AERole where piae.UID_AERole in ( select ca.uid_orgresponsible from compliancearea ca )"
+" union all "+
-- visible for: Compliance-Regel-Verantwortliche: ComplianceRule.UID_OrgResponsible, Compliance-Regel-Ausnahmegenehmiger: ComplianceRule.UID_OrgRuler format("select piae.UID_Person from PersonInAERole piae join AERoleCollection aec on aec.UID_ParentAERole = piae.UID_AERole where piae.UID_AERole in ( select cr.uid_orgruler from ComplianceRule cr where ({0})) or piae.UID_AERole in ( select cr.uid_orgresponsible from ComplianceRule cr where ({0})) " , sqlor(sqlcompare("cr.isinactive",false,"bool","equal"),sqlcompare("cr.isworkingcopy",false,"bool","equal"))) ))

ConfigParam.Description: translate("#LDS#Visibility of Access Governance - Compliance overview")
